Locations.Name: Anywhere
Locations.Description: These activities are available anywhere in Tokyo within a few blocks' walk

Activities.Name: Convenience Store Beverage
Activities.Description: You step into the nearest konbini, squeeze through the aisles to the back, and select a refreshing beverage.  Then you quickly pay for it without making eye contact and drink it out front so you can throw the empty bottle into the store's recycle bin rather than carry it around all day.

Activities.Name: Convenience Store Snack
Activities.Description: You step into the nearest konbini, stare blankly at the dizzying array of bizarre snacks for several minutes, then grab a can of American potato chips you recognize but don't particularly like.  You snack on the chips as you continue your adventures.

Activities.Name: Eat at a Restaurant
Activities.Description: You enjoy a delightful meal at a cozy restaurant.

Activities.Name: Vending Machine Drink
Activities.Description: You purchase and consume a delicious bottle of unsweetened barley tea from the nearest vending machine.

Activities.Name: Vending Machine Snack
Activities.Description: You purchase and consume a delicious can of hot creamed corn from the nearest vending machine.

Activities.Name: Manga Cafe
Activities.Description: Rent an hour in a private booth with unlimited access to an internet-connected computer, comic books, and soft drinks.

Activities.Name: Get a Massage
Activities.Description: Step into the nearest massage parlor for an hour of relaxation.

Activities.Name: Go for a Walk
Activities.Description: Walk around and soak in the sights.

Activities.Name: Sleep in a Stairwell
Activities.Description: You lie down on the ground and take a nap in the stairwell to a nearby subway station.

Activities.Name: Sleep in a Capsule Hotel
Activities.Description: Lie down on the ground and take a nap in the stairwell to a nearby subway station.

Locations.Name: The Akihabara District
Locations.Description: Tokyo's Technology/Gaming/Anime/Hentai District.  The Mecca of nerds everywhere.

Activities.Name: Play the Claw Machines
Activities.Description: Try your skill at the claw machines in an arcade.

Activities.Name: Play Fighting Games
Activities.Description: Despite being one of the top players in America, you struggle to win a single round against random people in the arcade.

Activities.Name: Shop for Retro Games
Activities.Description: Purchase some classic video games from the 80s through the naughties.

Activities.Name: Use a Photo Booth
Activities.Description: Take memorable photos at a nearby photo booth.

Activities.Name: Maid Cafe
Activities.Description: Relax at a nearby Maid Cafe, where young women in elaborate French Maid outfits fawn over you while serving overpriced, low-quality food and drinks.  Sort of like Hooters for anime nerds.

Locations.Name: The Boring District
Locations.Description: One of the many boring non-Akihabara locations in Tokyo

Activities.Name: Visit a Shrine
Activities.Description: Visit a boring 500+ year-old shrine

Activities.Name: Visit a Park
Activities.Description: Visit a boring park full of tourists taking boring photos of the same boring trees

Activities.Name: Visit a Tall Tower
Activities.Description: Ride an elevator to the top of some boring tower with a dubious claim to a world record

Activities.Name: Buy Lame Souvenirs
Activities.Description: Buy lame souvenirs for your friends at a mall or a shop or whatever.

Locations.Name: Hotel Vicinity
Locations.Description: The area of town within walking distance of your hotel

Activities.Name: Sleep in Hotel Room
Activities.Description: Go to your room and sleep.

Activities.Name: Play Games Online
Activities.Description: Hang out in your hotel room and play games over the internet with your friends in America.
